sourcesContent:
My To-Do List

  • {{item.name}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { newTask=''; tasks: string[]; constructor() { const storedTasks = localStorage.getItem('tasks'); this.tasks = storedTasks ? JSON.parse(storedTasks) : []; } addTask() { if (this.newTask.trim() !== '') { this.tasks.push(this.newTask); this.newTask = ''; localStorage.setItem('tasks', JSON.stringify(this.tasks)); } } removeTask(index: number) { this.tasks.splice(index, 1); localStorage.setItem('tasks', JSON.stringify(this.tasks)); } editTask(index: number) { const newTask = prompt('Enter the new task'); if (newTask !== null && newTask.trim() !== '') { this.tasks[index] = newTask; localStorage.setItem('tasks', JSON.stringify(this.tasks)); } } }
